SEARCH
Package eu.ggnet.lucidcalc.jexcel

Class JExcelLucidCalcReader

java.lang.Object
eu.ggnet.lucidcalc.jexcel.JExcelLucidCalcReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
LucidCalcReader
public class JExcelLucidCalcReader extends Object implements LucidCalcReader
The most KIS tool for reading plain calc docs. If not other configured, the defaults are
  • headline = true
  • trim = true
  • columns = {0}
  • all Types are String
Author:
oliver.guenther

      public JExcelLucidCalcReader addColumn(int id, Class<? extends Object> type)
      Add a new Column definition for the read. TODO: You may not add a column with a lower number than all columns before, check or change

      Parameters:
      id - the column id (0=A, 1=B, 2=C, ... )
      type - the Type of the column. Allowed Values: String,Double,Integer
      Returns:
